mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the plays Blithe Spirit Dec 16-17 | Much Ado About Nothing Dec 18 | Our Town Dec 19 | Arms and the Man Dec 20.

Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/).
